intro.title: Junior Laravel Developer
intro.description: of experience. I specialize in building
intro.tech: Laravel, Filament, Livewire, and modern PHP

about.title: About Me
about.description: I'm a Junior Laravel developer with 2+ years of experience building scalable web applications. I've worked on various projects including admin panels, inventory systems, and booking tools, gaining hands-on experience with Laravel, Filament, and Livewire while delivering solutions for both enterprise clients and local businesses.
about.background: My technical expertise includes Laravel ecosystem tools like Filament for admin interfaces, Livewire for dynamic frontends, and modern development practices with Git and Agile methodologies. I'm proficient in building REST APIs, working with MySQL databases, and creating responsive interfaces with Tailwind CSS and Alpine.js.
about.approach: I focus on writing clean, maintainable code and following best practices in web development. Whether it's building admin dashboards, implementing business logic, or optimizing application performance, I'm committed to delivering quality solutions. I'm passionate about continuous learning and staying updated with the latest Laravel features and development trends.

projects.title: Featured Projects
projects.description: Explore a portfolio of Laravel applications I've built, including admin panels, inventory systems, and booking tools. Each project demonstrates Laravel best practices, clean code, and modern development techniques.

ecommerce.title: E-commerce Platforms
ecommerce.description: Custom-built online stores with features like product catalogs, shopping carts, secure payment gateway integration (Stripe, PayPal), order management, and user accounts.

adminPanels.title: Admin Panels & Dashboards
adminPanels.description: Powerful and intuitive admin interfaces for managing application data, users, and settings. Includes features like role-based access control, data visualization, and activity logging.

saas.title: SaaS Applications
saas.description: Scalable and secure Software-as-a-Service products with features like subscription management, multi-tenancy, user onboarding, and robust back-end infrastructure.

currentJob.title: Web Developer
currentJob.description: Develop and maintain enterprise-grade web applications using Laravel, Filament, Livewire, and Alpine.js, enhancing performance and scalability. Build internal dashboards in Agile teams, reducing feature delivery time by 20%. Refactor legacy codebases, improving maintainability and test coverage. Collaborate with designers, PMs, and clients to deliver user-focused features.

internship2024.title: Web Developer Intern
internship2024.description: Built a Laravel-based admin panel for a final-year project using Filament PHP, streamlining backend workflows. Mastered company processes, delivering a scalable application under tight deadlines.

freelance.title: Freelance Web Developer
freelance.description: Developed and deployed 10+ full-stack Laravel applications, including booking systems, CRMs, and inventory tools, for local businesses. Managed end-to-end project lifecycles, from requirements gathering to QA and support, achieving 100% client satisfaction. Optimized performance using MySQL and REST APIs.

firstIntern.title: Web Development Intern
firstIntern.description: Contributed to two internal PHP projects using Laravel and CodeIgniter, implementing MVC patterns and REST APIs. Streamlined version control with Git, enhancing team collaboration. Improved debugging efficiency, reducing issue resolution time by 15%.

education.title: Bachelor's in Business Intelligence
education.description: Graduated with honors, focusing on data-driven solutions. Relevant coursework: Data Analytics, Database Systems. Developed strong foundation in data analysis, system design, and decision support systems.

contact.title: Contact Me
contact.successMessage: Thank you for your message! I'll get back to you soon.
